recipe.preparation: Saute shrimp or other meat in butter for 4 minutes.  Season with salt and pepper and add 2 jiggers of cognac.  Light (yay!  flames!) and serve.
recipe.name: Shrimps and Things in Cognac
recipe.source_name: "A Book Of Appetizers", Helen Evans Brown

ingredient.ingredient_name: raw shrimp, turkey or chicken breast
